ygData.subject: Re: Items of interest
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I buy them from Rashinda, in the Landholder s office in Freeport. Saves me a *lot* of money... BTW, is their *really* a reason to buy Rations, or
ygData.messageBody:
> Date: Sun, 25 Apr 1999 07:08:38 -0400
> From: "Dan Kassiday" <kassiday@...>
>Subject: Re: Items of interest
>
>I have to ask since I am sick of fishcakes, Where do you get muffins?

I buy them from Rashinda, in the Landholder's office in Freeport. Saves me
a *lot* of money...

BTW, is their *really* a reason to buy Rations, or especially Iron Rations?
They don't really seem to last longer than any other food item. I haven't
timed this, and I haven't bought many of these Rations, but they just don't
seem to be worth the money.

Lorimi, Cazic-Thule
